name: savelyenne

repos.name: pfn/keepasshttp

message: Apparently, savelyenne is working on a keepass plugin to expose password entries securely (256bit aes/cbc) over http by binding a responsive navigation plugin without library dependencies and with fast touch screen support and a simple image lightbox for twitter bootstrap. Dangerous stuff.
